name: ClickerLoL
description:
This is a clicker created by me, it is in development, but the game will be simple.

Click on the circle and score! But... There is one but... You will be hindered by an enemy every 25 seconds! If you do not have time to click on it, then you will lose and 100 coins will be taken from you.

Good luck in the game!

Engine: Pocket Code by Catrobat

Music by: GreatestCookie
